name: A SCAB IS A LESION WITH COHESION.
description: I love sentences that internally rhyme and are inherent truths about something. In this case, A SCAB IS A LESION WITH COHESION is the raw truth about how simultaneously the definition and the functionality of a scab are used in the least amount of words possible and how they can exist in language form. It's short, elegant, succinct, presented in a pure minimalist fashion. The art here is to make the perfect sentence.
